name: selenium-chrome-driver-demo
description: A demonstration of executing browser automation via Selenium and Docker

scripts.webdriver:update: webdriver-manager update; cd node_modules/.bin; unlink chromedriver; ln -sf ../webdriver-manager/selenium/chromedriver_*[0-9] chromedriver; unlink geckodriver; ln -s ../webdriver-manager/selenium/geckodriver-*[0-9] geckodriver

author: Denver B.
